ChallengeMethod.description: The challenge method used to confirm the userâ€™s identity. Possible values include the following. Email SMS TOTP_CHOICE: The user chooses multi-factor authentication. TOTP_ONLY: The user is required to use multi-factor authentication.

ChallengeSentDate.description: The date and time that the user was authenticated.

IsAuthenticated.description: If true, the user has already been authenticated.

SourceIp.description: The IP address the user logged in from.

UsersId.description: The ID of the user associated with this item.
